meanings.definition: The act of hardening or making something hard in advance.
meanings.sent1: The prehardening of the clay made it easier to sculpt.
meanings.sent2: The prehardening process of the metal increased its durability.
meanings.sent3: The prehardening of the ice cream in the freezer led to a deliciously firm texture.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to prehardening his skills in basketball paid off during the championship game.
meanings.sent5: The prehardening of the cement ensured a strong foundation for the building.

meanings.definition: The state of being hardened or made hard in advance.
meanings.sent1: The prehardening of the wood prevented it from warping in the humidity.
meanings.sent2: The prehardening of the plastic made it resistant to impact.
meanings.sent3: The prehardening of the chocolate in the fridge made it challenging to break off a piece.
meanings.sent4: Her prehardening of resolve helped her face the challenges ahead with confidence.
meanings.sent5: The prehardening of the leather ensured its longevity and strength.
